vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == nominatedOwner, "You must be nominated before you can accept ownership");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: pragma
vulnerability_findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in TokenExchanger.sol:
	- Version used: ['>=0.4.24', '^0.5.16']
	- TokenExchanger.sol#3 declares pragma solidity^0.5.16
	- TokenExchanger.sol#43 declares pragma solidity>=0.4.24
	- TokenExchanger.sol#69 declares pragma solidity>=0.4.24
	- TokenExchanger.sol#91 declares pragma solidity>=0.4.24
	- TokenExchanger.sol#212 declares pragma solidity>=0.4.24
	- TokenExchanger.sol#254 declares pragma solidity>=0.4.24
	- TokenExchanger.sol#294 declares pragma solidity^0.5.16

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function checkBalanceSNXDirect(address account) public view synthetixProxyIsSet returns (uint) {

        return IERC20(synthetix).balanceOf(account);
vulnerability_findings.message: TokenExchanger.checkBalanceSNXDirect (TokenExchanger.sol#323-325) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function getDecimals(address tokenAddress) public view returns (uint) {

        return IERC20(tokenAddress).decimals();
vulnerability_findings.message: TokenExchanger.getDecimals (TokenExchanger.sol#327-329) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: TokenExchanger.doTokenSpend (TokenExchanger.sol#331-347) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in TokenExchanger.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (TokenExchanger.sol#3): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (TokenExchanger.sol#294): it allows old versions
